text: Lambton is a municipality of about 1600 people in Le Granit Regional County Municipality in the Estrie region of Quebec, Canada. Lambton is mostly rural and agricultural area with some business on the two main roads in town. ==Transportation== The main roads connecting Lambton are Route 108 and Route 263. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Municipalities in Quebec Category:Incorporated places in Estrie Category:Le Granit Regional County Municipality
title: Lambton, Quebec
